sentences: See on suurepärane koht kokkutuleku korraldamiseks.
context: Suurepärane is an Estonian adjective that means excellent, great, magnificent, or wonderful. It's used to describe something as being of high quality, impressive, or outstanding in a positive way. The word can be declined in various grammatical forms including nominative (suurepärane), genitive (suurepärase), partitive (suurepäraset), comparative (suurepärasem), and superlative (kõige suurepärasem). It's commonly used to describe places, things, people, weather conditions, results, or any situation that is considered exceptionally good.
